QuestData.Title: The Waters Run Red...
QuestData.Description: <The communication console hums.>$B$BThose worgen you killed were the scouting party. There are hundreds more incoming! Looks like Crowley and Bloodfang made the blood offering to every human in Lordaeron.$B$BGet in one of those Horde cannons and send them all back to their makers. Let the waters of Lordamere Lake run red with their blood!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The waters of Lordamere Lake will run red with the blood of the worgen!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 50 Hillsbrad Worgen with the Horde Cannon.
QuestData.RewardText: Though you killed a large number of the newly turned worgen, many more are sure to appear. Still, their assault will have softened. Well done, $n!
